title: Electrical Dipole Gradient Visualization with Matplotlib
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use Matplotlib to create a gradient plot of an electrical dipole. You will learn how to create a triangulation, refine data, and compute the electrical field. Finally, you will plot the triangulation, the potential iso-contours, and the vector field.

meta.title: Matplotlib Gradient Plot | Electrical Dipole Visualization
meta.description: Learn how to create a gradient plot of an electrical dipole using Matplotlib. Explore triangulation, data refinement, and electrical field computation.
meta.keywords: Matplotlib, Gradient Plot, Electrical Dipole, Triangulation, Data Refinement, Electrical Field
